name: tm47
effect: Teaches Steel Wing to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Low Sweep to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Steel Wing Gen I: Explosion)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
